short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Pokken Tournament to the tier list maker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your own tier lists and matchup charts for Pokken Tournament DX. This extension adds all characters (including supports) from Pokken to the "MMCafe Tierchart Maker" by MMCafe and links to a tier list maker on "TierMaker.com".

Thanks to @Double_FGC on Twitter for the images of support characters.
